extension.summary: Screensaver that plays a user defined (smart) playlist
extension.description: The Playlist Screensaver plays media from a (smart) playlist as screensaver. As it opens the default player it is required to press 'Stop' to exit the screensaver. .m3u and .xsp are the supported file types.
extension.disclaimer: Enable 'Use dim if paused during video playback' when selecting this screensaver
